this is only for media streaming. i need full support , all file types , uploading , downloading , user accounts privileges , monitoring , backup , browsing

I use my raspberry pi as a NAS controller, hooking it to a 1 Tera external hard disk, use debian on the Pi to share the drive using samba. and since this is debian so you will find packages to do the features you want. Although this setup is very tempting, I do not recommend it because it has low transfer rates from and to the NAS. It is OK if you want to use it for small files, but if you are planning to move large files (movies or so), it will be slow
